description:
Welcome home, dear viewer, as you`re greeted by a new face tonight. Meet Misawa, Akemi`s friend! How will she react when she meets Morita for the first time? Find out in tonight`s episode of lies and manhood.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Great Pretende (なりたい私に) / Let Me Into Your World (理解するのは難しい) / Trouble Man (あんた何なのよ)
The Great Pretender (I`ll Become Who I Want to Be) / Let Me into Your World (It`s Hard to Understand) / Trouble Man (Who Do You Think You Are?)
The Great Pretender (Naritai Watashi ni) / Let Me into Your World (Rikai Suru no wa Muzukashii) / Trouble Man (Anta Nani na no yo)
